caption.p: Affinities of R-synGAP-α1 for PDZ Domains of PSD-95. Dissociation constants (KD) and apparent dissociation constants (KDapp) for the interactions of r-synGAP-α1 with the PDZ domains of PSD-95 were determined by the Biacore/SPR 'competition in solution' method as described under 'Materials and methods.' In one experiment, the KD for PDZ3 was determined by conventional SPR as described under 'Materials and methods.' Goodness of Fit refers to the fit of data shown in Figures 4, 5, and 7 to the equation relating synGAPfree to PDZ domain concentration, assuming a single binding site, as described under 'Materials and methods.' Because PDZ12, and PDZ123 contain more than one binding site for r-synGAP-α1, the affinities are given as apparent dissociation constants. Data are expressed as mean ± S.E.

tr.th: Dissociation Constant (KD) for Binding to R-synGAP (nM)

tr.td: Apparent Dissociation Constant (KDapp) for Binding to R-synGAP (nM)
